item.title: Red Flags to Look for When Looking for a New Team
item.description: It is a new year and an strong job market with plenty of people looking for new roles. The following are a few red flags that I learned to look for from other developers and from my own experiences when looking a new team. In no particular order, here they are. Managers that do not have technical experience. This applies to people who are relatively early in their careers.

item.title: My journey into the tech field
item.description: I have been in the tech field for almost two years, and a common question that I get asked from college students and high school students that look like me is, “How did you get there?” So to all that ask, here is my story. If someone had asked me when I was in high school that I would be working in tech, I would not have believed them. Back then, I did not even know that was a career option.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.title: Placeholder Text
item.description: Lorem est tota propiore conpellat pectoribus de pectora summo.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: About Me
item.description: I am currently working as a security analyst. I have experience in creating applications in Python, PHP, JavaScript, and Java. I am passionate about getting under-represented minorites to thrive in the STEM field. For those in K-12 and are in Atlanta, please check out Johnson STEM Activity Center to see how you can be involved in STEM activities.

item.title: My Journey into the tech field
